physical_appearance: This is a red silk brocade skirt. It features a gold brocade pattern with leaf motifs, and a floral motif banel along the hem. It is a mid-length skirt.
sgcool_label_text: Silk brocade skirt, or chania, worn by the Jain community of Kutch
subject_terms_2: Ethnic costume Skirts Motifs Brocade Jains
